      • pacInit

        public final boolean pacInit(java.lang.String user,
              java.lang.String password,
              java.lang.String host,
              java.lang.String clienttype)
        Initiate a connection.
        Parameters:
        user - User ID
        password - Password
        host - Host IP Address
        clienttype - A unique string that distinguishes different kind of clients
        Returns:
        Whether a connection is sucessfully made.

      • pacSendData

        public final boolean pacSendData(byte[] buffer,
                  java.lang.String recv)
        Send user data, which will be automatically wrapped in a packet.
        Parameters:
        buffer - User data
        recv - Receiver ID
        Returns:
        Whether the packet is successfully sent after, if necessary, multiple retries.
